

#create config.h by cmake
#version.h is generated by git commit hook
configure_file( Tiki.cfg ${CMAKE_BINARY_DIR}/generated/core/Config.h )
configure_file( Version.h ${CMAKE_BINARY_DIR}/generated/core/Version.h COPYONLY )
message( STATUS "FIX ME | version.h git commit hook" )

add_subdirectory( core )
add_subdirectory( sdl2 )
